void RegressionTest::parseValgrindFile ( const std::string &  vgLog  )  [protected]

Read through valgrind output to determine memory leaks and errors.

Note that according to the valgrind manual it is best to compile the program with -O0 (optimization level zero) to avoid false positives. http://valgrind.org/docs/manual/quick-start.html#quick-start.prepare

Parameters:
vgLog - valgrind output with the --log-file option
